developer_comment: ATi Studios2020년 9월 25일Hello, Thanks for the feedback. Mondly has free content as well: daily lessons so you can create a learning routine; weekly quizzes and monthly challenges to test your progress. We do have paid content but that’s so we can keep the lights on. We’re just working on making your Mondly experience better and better! Happy learning! Ioana, Customer Care
